title: Pasadena Craftsman Bungalow Roof Replacement
summary: Historic 1923 home with failing asphalt shingles and poor ventilation causing attic mold. Replaced with architectural shingles, added ridge/soffit vents, repaired decking.
outcome: Eliminated leaks, improved energy efficiency by 25%, preserved architectural style while meeting HOA approval. Homeowner reported cooler attic temps.
